item.title: Starlene add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description:
"The Voice
There is a voice inside of you That whispers all day long, "I feel this is right for me, I know that this is wrong." No teacher, preacher, parent, friend Or wise man can decide What's right for you--just listen to The voice that speaks inside." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "I will not play at tug o' war. I'd rather play at hug o' war, Where everyone hugs Instead of tugs, Where everyone giggles And rolls on the rug, Where everyone kisses, And everyone grins, And everyone cuddles, And everyone wins." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Think and wonder, wonder and think." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Everything is funny, if you can laugh at it." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Starlene add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Why it's simply impassible! Alice: Why, don't you mean impossible? Door: No, I do mean impassible. <i>(chuckles)</i> Nothing's impossible!" -- Lewis Carroll
